comment._content: Charles Warren Fairbanks (1852-1918) was Vice President of the US, under Theodore Roosevelt. His wife Cornelia "Nellie" Cole Fairbanks (1852-1913) was president of the National Society, Daughters of the American Revolution. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cornelia_Cole_Fairbanks www.corneliacolefairbanksdar.org/about-cornelia-cole-fair...

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: So the photo would have been circulated at the time of her demise. She died on October 25, 1913, and one of Bain's minions has dated the photo 10-27-13.
